channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Generational Wealth: Does the Apple Fall Far From the Tree?
item.description: There is strong evidence that most “rich families” will be poorer after several generations. Some of the reasons for this are systemic like taxes. But most factors that diminish a family’s wealth over generations are the choices that heirs make.

item.title: Howard Schultz urges Starbucks to 'fix' U.S. stores after big earnings miss
item.description: “The company’s fix needs to begin at home:”

item.title: State Capitalism in Private Markets: Mission Creep
item.description: Governments relish mingling in markets. Yet, if past policies are any guide, taxpayers are being shortchanged.

item.title: Cesar Luis Menotti, the ‘thin one’ who led Argentina to its first World Cup in 1978, has died at 85
item.description: The longtime smoker once talked of meeting the great writer Jorge Luis Borges: "When I asked him if it bothered him that I smoked, he told me: ‘What intoxicates me is not the cigarette, but the stupid conversations.’”

item.title: Implementation Shortfalls Hamstring Factor Strategies
item.description: Smart rebalancing rules help portfolio managers capture more of the return that is inherent in their factor strategies. Concentrating on “priority best” trading improves factor portfolio performance.

item.title: Columbia cancels university-wide commencement amid protests but will hold smaller ceremonies 5 miles away from the main campus
item.description: “Our students emphasized that these smaller-scale, school-based celebrations are most meaningful to them and their families."

item.title: IFRS Accounting Standard Will Support Better Investment Decisions
item.description: IFRS 18 responds to investors' concerns about challenges in comparing companies' financial performance.

item.title: Kim Godwin, first Black female network news chief, leaves ABC News
item.description: After working at ABC, CBS and NBC, Godwin said she's quitting the business. “I leave with my head held high and wish the entire team continued success."

item.title: Meir Statman: Your State of Mind Influences Your Investing Success
item.description: Meir Statman shares his insights on the broader aspects of financial well-being and its interconnection with life satisfaction.

item.title: Tesla may charge Model Y owners to unlock the full potential of their batteries
item.description: That could bump the cost up another $2,000
